name: Concerted Efforts
tooltip:
Concerted EffortsLevel 60

Bring 3 Alterac Valley Mark of Honor, 3 Arathi Basin Mark of Honor and 3 Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor to an Alliance Brigadier General outside the battlegrounds.

Requirements:
- Alterac Valley Mark of Honor x 3
- Arathi Basin Mark of Honor x 3
- Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor x 3
